Based on the user's interests, I would recommend "Se7en" and "Gone Girl". Both of these movies are thrilling and intense, with a mix of excitement and warmth.

In "Se7en", seven strangers are brought together in a remote location. As they begin to interact with one another, tensions rise and ultimately leads to murder.

In "Gone Girl", the narrative follows the story of a woman named Amy Dunne who vanished without a trace. When her husband becomes increasingly suspicious and begins investigating the case, he discovers that his wife had actually faked her own disappearance in order to frame her husband for the crime she committed.
